name: Slash FRVR (itch)
description:
Slash everything that moves, except for the bombs! Now you know everything you need to know to play and enjoy this game.

Slash FRVR Features:
- Easy to learn gameplay
- One click or tap play
- Great music
- Amazing Graphics

Slash, slice and cut your way to success in this simple yet addictive and fun game.

Train your ninja skills and become a sensei when you reach 1000 points!
